titleStmt.title: A sermon of ecclesiastical benediction preached at Oundle at a visitation, Apr. 14. 1619. by Master Samuel Gibson, minister at Burleigh in Rutland.
titleStmt.author: Gibson, Samuel.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by F[elix] K[ingston] for William Barringer, at the great north-doore of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
